solution_line_template: First find the cost of fixing the wall: ${stove_cost} * {wall_fraction} = ${<<{stove_cost}*{wall_fraction}={wall_repair_cost}>>}{wall_repair_cost}
Then add the cost of the replacement stove to find the total cost: ${wall_repair_cost} + ${stove_cost} = ${<<{wall_repair_cost}+{stove_cost}={total_cost}>>}{total_cost}
